span.a: Frontier High School Last Day of School

br.br:
Produced by EHS students Ben Humphrey, Megan Kelly, and Kayla Mulkin. Special thanks to EHS EZTV
16-17 students.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-size: large; color: black;

p.strong: To listen to the board meeting via a YouTube audio-only live stream,click here to go to ESD's YouTube Channel. The live audio stream will start just before 6:00pm. Reload the webpage if you don't see a "Live Now" link at the top of the webpage at 6:00pm

hr.p: Elizabeth School District will be distributingFREEmeals for students
10am-12pm Monday through Fridayat the following locations:

p.strong: Elizabeth Middle School-34427 County Road 13 Elizabeth, CO 80107
Singing Hills Elementary-41012 Madrid Drive Parker, Co 80138
Free meals provide forStudents 18 years old & younger. Children must be present to receive meal packs.

hr.p: Drive Thru-One meal pack will be given per child and will include lunch for that day and breakfast for the following day

p.strong: Please pop your trunk to collect meals for children under 18 in car

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

div.span: The Elizabeth School District Board of Education Meeting, Monday, April 20 at 6pm, will be held at the district board room and will include video conferencing for authorized staff and board members.

The Districttakes seriously the health and safety of its staff, board members, and community members. In accordance with Executive Order 20-23 issued by Governor Jared Polis and Centers for Disease Control and Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment guidance, gatherings of 10 people or more are prohibited. Accordingly, in-person attendance at the meeting is limited to essential District personnel and Board members.
To ensure transparency of the Boards proceedings, members of the public who want to listen to the live-feed audio of the meeting can access it here:
or after the meeting, to listen to a recording of the meeting, can access it here:
In addition, the written recommendation to the Board of Education for Frontier High School is available on our website athttps://www.elizabethschooldistrict.org/domain/124.
